name: An Amazing 4Bedroom Home, Central London, Sleeps12

We are situated in Westminster, zone 2, Central London.The property has four bedrooms with comfy king size, double & single beds. There’s a large living room with 2 single sofa beds, and a double sofa bed. The kitchen seats 12-14. There are lots of restaurants nearby. Perfect for large groups of families and friends. Please ask for any special requirements. We are 3 stops by direct line from Westfield and Paddington

The space

- 24/7 guest support
- Professionally cleaned
- Hotel-quality bed linen and towels

description:
I am proud to offer a recently redecorated double bedroom in an amazing flat in the heart of Maida Vale. The room is within a 5 minute walk away from Maida Vale Tube station. There is also Little Venice Canal nearby as well as Regents Park and Paddington Basin. The room is professionally cleaned after each guest and we use high quality beds with good linen and towels.

The space
A well thought out double room. The space is clean and well lit with large windows allowing the light in.

The kitchen is well equipped with a hob, oven, microwave, fridge and dishwasher.

The shared bathroom is fully equipped with toiletries for your use and the pressure of the shower is very good.

Other things to note
PLEASE NOTE, THAT ALL CHECK-INS AFTER 11PM CHARGES EXTRA 15£

name: Zone 1 : Spacious single bedroom in Bayswater
description:
My place is a very spacious room with a single bed in bayswater. It's surrounded by 3 underground stations - Royal Oak (2 minutes walking), Bayswater (5 minutes walking), and Queensway ( 7 minutes walking). Plus, 24 hours buses can take you everywhere in London. Also, it's approximately 15 minutes walking to Notting hills, and Hyde park is just 5 minutes away. It's a lovely area surrounded by nice restaurants and cafes. Opposite to Waitrose and very closed to 3 other supermarket.

The space
You can use bathroom and kitchen in our flat

Guest access
Kitchen and bathroom

Other things to note
I share my apartment with my friend - Luisa. She’s doing her master degree in history of design at RCA. I need to rent out my place for 2 weeks because I need to do my research on the final project in Barcelona. So, I’d prefer a girl in my room. So, it’s easier to share with my flatmate.

name: Large Smart Room 20 minutes walk to Big Ben
description:
Dear Guest,
One of the major bonuses is the fact that the flat is located just within 3 minutes walk to the Thames Embankment just opposite the Westminster Palace.
The other great thing is that it is newly refurbished and is clean and warm.
It has a small fire place. Far from the main road and it's quiet .
The kitchen is modern and has a dishwasher and a washing machine.
Good pressure shower! There is an extra utility room (third bedroom in fact) to iron, dry towels, and store your luggage.

The space
The place you are going to stay is in an older building but this building is very characteristic for London.
Around the corner you will find: MI5 building, Albert Embankment, London Eye.
Tate Britain, Westminster Abbey, Palace of Westminster with the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben are across the bridge. From there it’s an easy walk towards the Trafalgar Square, National Gallery, Soho and Covent Garden

name: Large Notting Hill 2BR near Portobello Rd
description:
Large two bedroom flat in the heart of Notting Hill - spacious bedrooms and bathroom with shower, bathtub and washer dryer.

Kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, freezer, microwave, toaster, Nespresso machine, Nutribullet blender, cocktail kit and the usual bits and bobs you’d expect.

We have a 40” TV with Google Chromecast. WiFi provided however doesn’t reach master bedroom.

The space
Our flat is perfect for exploring London! Westbourne Park tube station is a four minute walk, Ladbrooke Grove nine minute (both Circle and Hammersmith & City lines) or a fifteen minute walk to Notting Hill Gate (Centre, Hammersmith & City, Circle & District lines). It takes about 20 minutes to get to Oxford Circus and 30 minutes to Shoreditch - really well connected to get most places in London.

Portobello Rd is one block over f

The second bedroom is not that much smaller than the master bedroom, has plenty of light and also has a very comfy double-sized bed, with fitted wardrobe.

The sitting room

A little bit about the local area:

The London Borough of Newham i/ˈnjuːəm/ is a London borough formed from the towns of West Ham and East Ham, within East London.
It is situated 5 miles (8 km) east of the City of London, and is north of the River Thames. Newham is one of the six host boroughs for the 2012 Summer Olympics and contains most of the Olympic Park including the Olympic Stadium

name: Trendy 3BR Family Garden Home in Dalston - up to 5 guests!

The living room has a comfortable sitting area, fireplace and TV, perfect for relaxing in the evening, while the adjoining kitchen and dining table are great for social cooking and eating together. Plus access to your own private garden!

The kitchen is equipped with a stove, oven, microwave, toaster, kettle, and fridge to easily prepare a tasty home cooked meal. The cooking utensils and kitchenware are provided for your use as well!

There are three bedrooms. The first one is complete with a king bed that will

Check in on weekends is flexible, please get in touch if you have questions.

Designed and equipped to the highest standard, MStay 146 Studios offer exceptional value when it comes to budget accommodation in London, and a superb alternative to expensive hotel accommodation. Hi!! Mario here. I’m 34 years old living and working in London. I have a nice caracter and like to share the house with other people. My flat it’s 3 rooms and we are 2-3 living in it. The room was private and we split the bathroom and the kitchen

description:
This is a light, quiet and recently decorated flat close to the centre of London. There are three tube lines within easy walking distance, as well as buses and the overground, and access to the pubs, restaurants and fashionable shops of Islington.

The space
This is a spacious one bedroom flat with a large living room, a kitchen with a table for 4 people you can sit and eat in and a bathroom with a fitted shower. There is a double bed in the bedroom and a sofa and double futon in the living room. It is ideal for a single or a couple. No children, pets or extra guests. The flat was recently decorated. It is in a Victorian building with an office and one other flat underneath. It overlooks a park and is on a residential road, so is quiet. It is also very light and airy, having windows on three sides of the building, so you get the sun throughout the day. It is extremely central and well connected - Highbury and Islington on the Victoria Line and Holloway Road on the

name: Studio Two ArtHouse London Bridge
description:
The ArtHouse is a unique former sculptor's studio which has been transformed into an exhibition space for contemporary art . The apartment is a private and separate unit on the second floor and accessed through the exhibition space.
The large kitchen and dining area at the ground floor is shared with other guests of the house.

The space
The two large and private open plan bedrooms, located at the second floor, share an en-suite bathroom as well as a roof terrace. The artwork in the rooms is part of the curatorial programme and changes with each exhibition.
Ideal for families or friends up to 4 people. The large kitchen and dining is suitable for dinner parties.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire house including the exhibition space and all
amenity areas. The main entrance to the house is directly at ground floor from Melior Place.

description:
This is a stunning double fronted house, located in the heart of Fulham. With a stunning open plan living area as you enter the home, a second sitting room, and four decadent and stylish bedrooms, this tasteful and divine home is spacious and luxurious, perfect for your trip to London.

Located just 3 minutes from the tube, and with an excellent selection of restaurants, cafes and shops close by, this is truly the ideal home from home.

The space
This is a beautiful space in a fantastic location. The ground floor features the bright open-plan kitchen/dining/sitting area, as well as a WC.
There is then a fantastic lower ground floor, where you will find the blue sitting room, a perfect spot to relax after a day exploring London. There is also a bathroom here, and a room with the sofa bed in.
The first floor boasts the master bedroom with its exquisite en-suite bathroom (with both bath and shower), as well as a double bedroom with an ensuite.

description:
Kenmare is beautiful spacious house with a professional environment, full of greenery and located on the old A13 in Rainham close to public transport and a super store.
We are a 20 minute drive from the Lakeside Shopping Centre.
The house comes with a fully equipped kitchen, free high speed Wi-Fi access, washing machine, secured gated free parking spaces, beautiful garden and shared lounge area with flat screen TV, Virgin Media and a number of channels for your viewing pleasure.

description:

With great transport links - the Northern and Victoria lines just a 5 minute walk away - The world's your oyster... or London's your oyster card at least!

The space
My home is a two bedroom apartment, on the 4th floor of a 6 storey building. It is open plan and the main living space and kitchen gets the sun in the mornings and afternoons, making it is a very airy and bright living space.

The apartment is your own. Cleaned professionally with fresh luxury linens, it's prepared for each new visitor.

Other things to note
I have listed the flat as non-smoking as I do not smoke. However, if you wish to, there is a balcony you can use, with a chair, and an ashtray!

description:
This cool and comfortable one bedroom flat on the ground floor of a Georgian building. It is centrally located on a quiet street one block from the station. Enjoy the village feel in the local cafes, restaurants, rooftop bars and parks. I do!

My friend has been living here happily for the last three years. Sadly he has just left so I thought it would be nice to open it to AirBnB travellers.

The space
Use the kitchen to make yourself some breakfast, watch the news on TV in the kitchen/ living room, catch up with your emails in the study and work on your tan in the little patio garden

Private flat with patio

No smoking and no pets please.

The space
I have a double and a single bed, in the back double bedroom downstairs, please note there isn't a TV in this room. Wifi is available and this is found in the information provided in the room. Should you forget your travel adapter there are plugs in the small bedside drawer for your use whilst you're with us.

Guest access
My guests are able to access all rooms with the exception of mine, my daughter's and my son's bedrooms and the lounge.

Other things to note
We have a happy friendly outlook so feel free to have a chat with us. We love hearing your reasons for travelling and plans for your stay. We like to share our love of London and some cool places to visit.
I do have

name: Delightful Private Bedroom, 2 mins to Tube
description:
Private double bedroom with shared use of a modern kitchen, living room and main bathroom. Guests get their own private toilet and full access to, Apple TV; along with wifi.

This private room is in an Edwardian mansion block in lovely Earls Court Square. Very close to Earls court tube station. Only 10mins into central London and 30mins away from Heathrow airport.

—————————————————
This private room is suitable for couples and solo female travellers only.

The space
Luxurious and cozy private bedroom with a beautiful view of a garden patio.
Amazing comfortable Westcott bed and double mirrored roomy wardrobe.

Guest access
Guests are free to use the shared living space with Apple TV, Netflix and dinning room table. A fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, washing machine and dryer is available. Guests get their own private toilet and of course are free to use the main bathroom with shower and bath.

name: Ensuite room (privat)  30 min to Central London
description:
LARGE DOUBLE EN-SUITE
You will live in a Victorian property in a very spacious double room decorated to a high standard with loads of storage space and your own en suite bathroom and toilet.

Kitchen facilities VERY limited (use of kettle). At host's discretion full use of kitchen. It depends on the length of stay ( 2 weeks or longer)

NO free laundry

Bathroom with walk in shower (disability access ) and toilet

Plentiful non-permitted street parking

The space
Local Co-op supermarket across road
Huge Sainsbury's nearby (walking distance)and Lidl (short bus ride). Bus stops infant of house.
Cafe shop, Pharmacy, Hairdresser, Co-op Shop, Fish and Chips Shop and Cash machine across road

Guest access
limited access to kitchen (use of kettle only). At host's discretion a more wider use of kitchen. It depends on the length of your stay (2 weeks or more)

Other things to note<

name: Flat in a new building, canal views
description:
2nd floor, new building with lots of sun (south facing). Floor to ceiling windows in the living room which slide to open giving a fully open aspect onto the Canal. There is also a balcony. Postcode: N1 5ET - pls check (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps for exact location.

The space
Thank you for your interest in my listing!

Make the most out of your experience in London in this modern one bedroom second floor apartment overlooking beautiful Regents Canal.

Serene spacious flat in a very central location, very convenient for getting around and overlooking beautiful Regents Canal. The flat boasts a lovely balcony south facing the Canal from which you can see local swans, ducks and geese swimming around))

One large bedroom with very comfortable orthopaedic mattress (2000 pocket springs) and a sofa in the large open plan living room. Intex Ultra Plush Queen Size Airbed is available as well.
Calm, peaceful and ideal both for the t

name: Close 2 Royal Arsenal, Thames Clipper City Airport
description: Please note the price is per person for each room

name: Large Double in a 2-bed garden flat in Ally Pally
description:
Large Double Room within a spacious Victorian 2-bed garden flat in the heart of Alexandra Palace. Stunning views. 3 min walk to Alexandra Palace & Park (events, gigs, panoramic views over London).
The flat is just a 2-min walk to Alexandra Palace station, which takes you to Finsbury Park (Victoria & Piccadilly line) in 7 minutes, Highbury & Islington (Victoria Line) in 10 minutes, and Old Street/Moorgate in 20 minutes.
Wood Green High Street & station (Piccadilly Line) are a 10-min walk away.

The space
Large Victorian split-level ground-floor flat with high ceilings, fireplace, large sash bay windows, and a huge garden. The living room is very large with a 3-seater sofa as well as an armchair. TV with unlimited access to shows and films.
The kitchen is fairly large, has a 4-seater kitchen table, washing machine, microwave, and access to the very large garden. You will also have full access to my pots/pans, kettle, tea & coffee making facilities,

name: Cosy room in very good location
description:
It is cosy room in wonderful location. The bus stop is located right in front of the house. You can walk to Maryland train station - 4 mins. Stratford station (Westfield Shopping Center) – 13 mins walk.
Very close to Tesco Express as well as restaurants with food from all around the world.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me – I am happy to answer them! 😊

3 more young people living in this house as well.

name: Charming house with garden in the heart of Peckham
description:
A bright and spacious house with a cosy living room and study with working fireplace, television and desk space. The large eat-in kitchen has doors out on to a private back garden. Upstairs the bedroom has a comfortable king-sized bed and plenty of cupboard space. The modern bathroom has a large bath and separate walk-in rain shower.

Guest access
You'll have access to the entire home, other than the second bedroom, which will be closed.

Other things to note
There may be a cat, Taff, there during your stay. She is very friendly and independent and goes in and out through the cat flap. If you would be happy to feed her that would be great, or if it’s inconvenient for you to do so I can get a friend or neighbour to come in.

name: King-size bed in stylish,  peaceful artist’s flat
description:
Super comfortable king-size bed, private room in a stylish, artist’s Victorian flat. Peaceful area, with lovely local restaurants and cafes, and easy access to Kings Cross in just 20 minutes. Great local pub with garden and traditional pub grub, several beautiful parks and easy access to the amazing Alexandra Palace.

The space
The space will be shared with an architect working in Shoreditch, who can give you lots of local tips and advice! The bright, airy flat is perfect for exploring the delights of the city, while enjoying somewhere calm and peaceful to come home to. The space is newly decorated, including (shared) bathroom and access to common areas. Stylish kitchen for cooking, and comfy sofa for relaxing at the end of the day. The room is spacious, with sole use of large wardrobes and lots of natural light.

Please note there is a two night minimum.

name: Top floor 1 bed apartment with spectacular views
description:
Our top floor one bedroom apartment with spectacular views will feel like a home away from home during your stay in London. Located just 2 minutes walk from both Barons Court and West Kensington underground stations, you're 20 minutes from Covent Garden. More locally you have all the amenities of Kensington, Chelsea and Hammersmith for shopping and restaurants. Queens Tennis club is also a 2 minute walk away.

The apartment is located in a secure portered building.

name: (8DH) Dreams Unlimited - Hounslow/Heathrow
description:
2 Bed Executive Apartment by Dreams Unlimited Serviced Accommodation.
Stylishly decorated, two Bedroom apartment with gated parking space (optional extra) offering comfort in a quiet location yet close to all the action when needed. Ideal for families and extended stays.

Penthouse views of London, High ceilings throughout, and attention to detail, this beautiful gated residence mixes all the heritage associated to a mansion conversion with the comforts of modern day luxury living.
Every room boasts an influx of natural light, highlighting the attention to detail in the finish of each one of our apartments. Each room has been carefully designed to take advantage of all modern living experiences without compromising on space and quality.

The Grove is a highly desirable residential road, moments away from Isleworth train station, Osterley tube station and has excellent local schools and amenities nearby. Situated in the heart of Isleworth and close proximit

name: Portobello Mews House for 8 guests+free parking
description:
This double-fronted modern mews house is right in the heart of Notting Hill, just off Portobello Road.
The traditional exterior has been given a contemporary makeover in steel and glass, and interiors are bright and sleek. A simple color palette of white walls and wood floors is brought to life with bold shapes and bursts of color, including the blood-red leather sofas, the pony-hide chaise, a striking suspended metal staircase that runs through the living room, and a hanging wood-burning stove.

The space
A house ideal for large groups or families.
Four bedrooms in total.
Two bedrooms on the ground floor+ensuite toilet and big shower room.
Dining-kitchen-living room with balcony on the first floor.
Two bedrooms (one with bathtub)+toilet on second floor.
Roof terrace.

Guest access
Entire house and roof terrace

Other things to note
Free parking in the private gated mews

name: Modern, Small Double Private Room
description:
A lovely cosy private room with a small double bed available in the heart of Battersea. This is the place to stay if you're looking for a clean, modern & stylish room. Located only 7 minutes walk from Clapham Junction and situated on a quiet residential development.
Perfect place to stay if you want to explore the city or just need to be well connected for work. Everything has been designed for your convenience without compromising on style.

The space
Bedroom includes :
- Comfy small double bed
- Desk & chair
- Clothes rail
- Large windows and lots of natural light
- Egyptian cotton towels
- Hairdryer

Bathroom:
- Shower gel
- Shampoo & conditioner

Kitchen:
- All kitchen appliances
- Tea/coffee/sugar
- Snacks
- Iron & ironing board
- Washing powder
